description: Purchase of Storage lockers for delivery and installation by March 28,2024.
full_summary:
### Storage Lockers

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4398756457
* **Publication Date**: January 17, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 1, 2024, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 28, 2024

#### Tender Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services has a requirement for the purchase of storage lockers to be delivered and installed in Ottawa, Ontario by March 28, 2024. This tender is part of the General Stream and covers a requirement amongst the Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets category of the Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C.

#### Tender Status

The tender status of this solicitation is cancelled.

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to various trade agreements, including:

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

#### Contact Information

* Name: Annick J. Clement
* Email: annick.j.clement@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Additional Information

The full Request for Bid (RFB) and attachments can be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account. Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 1, 2024, at 14:00 EST. 

### Regions of Delivery
* Ottawa, Ontario

### Contracting Entity
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5
* Contact Information: [Annix J. Clement, annick.j.clement@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annick.j.clement@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) Larger quantity
